data.text:
@SenJeffMerkley Hey kKk democrat,

Wasn’t racist and wasn’t  done by Trump
@SenJeffMerkley Democrats didn't give a shit when biden called a black musician a racial slur while in office

@SenJeffMerkley Democrats called us republicans far worst things fir over 10 years that would make nazis look like humanitarians. 
Let me remind you Democrats are open about wanting to bring back gas chambers and concentration camps

@SenJeffMerkley Senator, history is watching. Silence in the face of #IranMassacare speaks volumes. Iranians are demanding freedom and accountability:
The Iranian people NEED strong, targeted military support. Over 43,000 lives lost in just 48 hours, with thousands more facing execution.
